text: @staceyleewebber This A.M. WEBBER worked at The Budd factory in 1943 and was awarded this watch. Trying to find some history on it. My mother Mary E Peterson had it in her things. Im thinking they were friends.
@staceyleewebber I have a watch that has this on the back of it," A.M.WEBBER  Apr.19.1943 THE BUDD COMPANY. Did not know if this person was any relation to you.
